questions.question: If your friend takes your favorite pencil, you should call 911.
questions.result: NO - Only call 911 in case of an emergency.

questions.question: It's okay to accept a ride from a stranger if you are running late.
Of the many ways young people get into trouble with the law, (__________) is among the most common.
What color uniform does a San Diego County Sheriff's Department Deputy normally wear?
In what city did the first California gangs form?
If you see a house on fire, you should go inside to see if anyone is home.
questions.result: NO - Never go into a burning building.  You should immediately call 911 for help.

questions.question: Being cruel to animals is a crime.
Railroad trespassers may be arrested and fined.
questions.result: YES - Being on railroad property without permission is trespassing.

questions.question: What number do you call in case of an emergency?
Tampering with fire alarm apparatus and giving false alarms is a crime.
